messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: A 'dream' is a story or picture in your head when you are sleeping.

Write about your dreams. This will help you remember more details. Think about the people and the place in your dream. They might add to the meaning. You will write a lot in one week. Then you can connect your dreams to your daily life. You can connect them to things that happen and how you feel.
